name: Taiko no Tatsujin Wii: Chou Gouka Ban
overview: A lot of new songs such as "Midsummer Sounds good!", "Carrying You" and "Dragon Quest X", up to 100 songs in history! Up to 4 people can play together! Includes a new mode "Momentary exhilaration! Don-chan noisy" that you can enjoy even more. quick! Easy! Many times! A festival game that everyone can play, and a drum festival at home anytime!
